duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Restaurant Leader in day-to-day operations of the restaurant and uphold Raising Cane’s standards and culture in shift management responsibilities.
Manage cash handling and ensure accountability.
Enforce Raising Cane’s policies and standards and execute shift management meeting Raising Cane’s operations and safety standards.
Provide exemplary customer service and recognize problems, set goals, execute and convert plans into action to solve problems.
Utilize reward and recognition program for the crewmembers in the restaurant.
Ensure cleanliness of the restaurant and ensure the facility is in good working order.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required, some college preferred
